trans-unit.source: The install tool has been locked!

For security reasons, the install tool has been locked after a wrong password had been entered more than three times in a row. To unlock it, run vendor/bin/contao-console contao:install:unlock on the command line.
trans-unit.target: Drošības apsvērumu dēļ instalēšanas rīks tika bloķēts, ja vairāk nekā trīs reizes pēc kārtas tika ievadīta nepareiza parole. Lai to atbloķētu, komandrindā izpildiet vendor/bin/contao-console contao:install:unlock.

trans-unit.source: PHP is not allowed to write files!
Your server does not support file access via PHP; most likely PHP runs as Apache module under a different user. Please contact your server administrator and ask him to fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: Jūsu serveris neatbalsta piekļuvi failiem, izmantojot PHP; visticamāk, PHP darbojas kā Apache modulis ar citu lietotāju. Lūdzu, sazinieties ar servera administratoru un lūdziet, lai viņš atrisina problēmu.

trans-unit.source: Do not attempt to fix this yourself by making files and folders writable for everyone!
trans-unit.target: Nemēģiniet šo salabot, padarot datnes un mapes visiem rakstāmas!

trans-unit.source: Please enter a password to prevent unauthorized access.
trans-unit.target: Lūdzu, ievadiet paroli, lai novērstu neatļautu piekļuvi!

trans-unit.source: The password should be at least %d characters long!
Please enter the install tool password. The install tool password is not the same as the Contao back end password.
trans-unit.target: Lūdzu, ievadiet Instalēšanas rīka paroli. Instalēšanas rīka parole nav tā pati, kas Contao aizmugures parole.

trans-unit.source: You have to allow cookies to use Contao.
trans-unit.target: Jums ir jāatļauj sīkdatnes, lai lietotu Contao.

trans-unit.source: The database name must not contain dots!
Could not connect to the database!
Please enter your database connection parameters.
trans-unit.target: Lūdzu norādiet Jūsu datu bāzes savienojuma parametrus.

trans-unit.source: Here you can update the database schema.
Here you can import a .sql file from the templates directory. Any existing data will be deleted! If you only want to import a theme, please use the theme manager in the Contao back end instead.
trans-unit.target: Šeit varat importēt .sql datni no veidņu direktorija. Visi esošie dati tiks dzēsti! Ja vēlaties importēt tikai tēmu, lūdzu, izmantojiet tēmu pārvaldnieku Contao aizmugurē.

trans-unit.source: The import failed! Is the database up to date and is the template file compatible with your Contao version?
trans-unit.target: Importēšana neizdevās! Vai datubāze ir aktuāla un veidnes datne savietojama ar jūsu Contao versiju?

trans-unit.source: Any existing data will be deleted!
Any existing data will be deleted! Do you really want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Jebkuri pašreizējie dati tiks izdzēsti! Vai tiešām vēlaties turpināt?

trans-unit.source: Here you can create an admin user to log into the Contao back end.
trans-unit.target: Šeit jūs varat izveidot administratora lietotāju, lai pieslēgtos Contao aizmugurei.

trans-unit.source: An admin user has been created.
For security reasons you can not use the following characters here: #<>()\=
trans-unit.target: Drošības apsvērumu dēļ jūs nevarat šeit izmantot sekojošās zīmes: #<>()\=

trans-unit.source: The username must not contain any whitespace characters!
Please enter a valid e-mail address!
Your username and password must not be the same!
trans-unit.target: Jūsu lietotājvārds un parole nedrīkst sakrist!

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all fields to create an admin user!
trans-unit.target: Lūdzu, aizpildiet visus laukus, lai izveidotu administratora lietotāju!

trans-unit.source: Now please go to the Contao back end and check the system settings.
trans-unit.target: Tagad, lūdzu, ejiet uz Contao aizmuguri un pārbaudiet sistēmas iestatījumus.

trans-unit.source: You need at least Contao 3.2 to upgrade to Contao 4.
trans-unit.target: Jums vajag vismaz Contao 3.2, lai atjauninātu uz Contao 4.

trans-unit.source: A post installation task could not be completed!
The duplicate entries have been purged automatically. A backup of the original subscriptions has been stored in tl_newsletter_recipients_backup.
trans-unit.target: Dublikātu ieraksti tika automātiski dzēsti. Sākotnējo abonementu dublējums ir saglabāts tl_newsletter_recipients_backup.

trans-unit.source: Your database version is not supported!
Contao requires at least MySQL 5.1.0 but you have version %s. Please update your database version.
trans-unit.target: Contao nepieciešama vismaz MySQL 5.1.0, bet jums ir versija %s. Lūdzu, atjauniniet datu bāzes versiju.

trans-unit.source: The configured collation is not supported!
The configured collation %s is not available on your server. Please install it (recommended) or configure a different character set and collation in the config/config.yml file.
trans-unit.target: Jūsu serverī nav pieejama konfigurētā komplektēšana %s. Lūdzu, instalējiet to (ieteicams) vai konfigurējiet citu rakstzīmju kopu un collation konfigurācijas datnē config/config.yml.

trans-unit.source: The configured database engine is not supported!
The configured database engine %s is not available on your server. Please install it (recommended) or configure a different database engine in the config/config.yml file.
trans-unit.target: Serverī nav pieejama konfigurētā datubāzes programma %s. Lūdzu, instalējiet to (ieteicams) vai konfigurējiet citu datubāzes programmu datnē config/config.yml.

trans-unit.source: Invalid combination of database engine and collation!
trans-unit.target: Nepareiza datubāzes programmas un komplektēšanas kombinācija!

trans-unit.source: The configured database engine %s does not support utf8mb4. Please use InnoDB instead (recommended) or configure a different character set and collation in the config/config.yml file.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurētā datubāzes programma %s neatbalsta utf8mb4. Lūdzu, izmantojiet InnoDB (ieteicams) vai konfigurējiet citu rakstzīmju kopu un komplektēšanu datnē config/config.yml.

trans-unit.source: The innodb_large_prefix option is not enabled!
The innodb_large_prefix option is not enabled on your server. Please enable it (recommended) or configure a different character set and collation in the config/config.yml file.
trans-unit.target: Serverī nav iespējota opcija innodb_large_prefix. Lūdzu, iespējojiet to (ieteicams) vai konfigurējiet citu rakstzīmju kopu un sakārtojumu datnē config/config.yml.

trans-unit.source: Using large prefixes in MySQL versions prior to 5.7.7 and MariaDB versions prior to 10.2 requires the Barracuda file format and the innodb_file_per_table option.
trans-unit.target: Lielu prefiksu izmantošanai MySQL versijās pirms 5.7.7 un MariaDB versijās pirms 10.2 ir nepieciešams Barracuda failu formāts un opcija innodb_file_per_table.

trans-unit.source: Could not connect to the database using the connection URL found in the DATABASE_URL environment variable.
trans-unit.target: Nevarēja izveidot savienojumu ar datubāzi, izmantojot savienojuma URL, kas atrodams vides mainīgajā DATABASE_URL.

trans-unit.source: Your database server is not running in strict mode!
trans-unit.target: Jūsu datubāzes serveris nedarbojas stingrā režīmā!

trans-unit.source: Running MySQL in non-strict mode can cause corrupt or truncated data. Please enable the strict mode either in your my.cnf file or configure the connection options in the config/config.yml file as follows:
trans-unit.target: Ja MySQL tiek palaists ne stingrā režīmā, var tikt bojāti vai saīsināti dati. Lūdzu, iespējojiet stingro režīmu vai nu savā my.cnf datnē, vai konfigurējiet savienojuma opcijas config/config.yml datnē šādi:
